data.enText: an amount of money that is paid regularly to sb, especially a priest, as wages or money to live on
data.chText: （尤指神职人员的）生活津贴，薪俸；献仪

data.enText: a summer internship with a small stipend

tr: a sum of money allotted on a regular basis

value.def: A stipend is a sum of money that is paid regularly, especially to a magistrate or a member of the clergy, as a salary or for their living expenses.
value.tran: (尤指地方法官或神职人员的)薪俸，生活津贴

value.def: A stipend is a sum of money that is paid to a student for their living expenses.
